page.title: 10LAKESIDE HOLIDAY PARK
page.content: HAS A 15 ACRE FIELD FOR TENTS AND TOURING CARAVANS.HERE IS A SWIMMING POOL.ELSEWHERE THERE ARE 52 SIX BERTH CARAVANS FOR HIRE FROM THE OIWNING COMPANY AT RATES VARYING FROM Â£55 A WEEK IN APRIL TO Â£150 A WEEK IN JULY. IN ADDITION THERE ARE SITESD FOR 250 PRIVATELY OWNED STATIC CARAVANS. THE HOLIDAY PARK OFFERS VISITORS A CLUB, A RESTAURANT, SWIMMING POOL, SAUNA AND SOLARIUM, BINGO ARCADE,FISHING AND A BOUNCY CASTLE -A LARGE INFLATED RUBBER CONSTRUCTION VAGUELY REMINISCENT OF CASTLE ARCHITECTURE WHICH VIBRATES TO PROVIDE ENTERTAINMENT FOR CHILDREN WHO JUMP ABOUT ON IT.HOLIDAYMAKERS COME MAINLY FROM SOUTH YORKSHIRE AND NOTTS.FACILITIES NOT FREELY AVAILABLE TO LOCAL PEOPLE BUT MUCH SUMMER WORK FOR TEENAGERS. MUCH AFFECTED BY MINERS' STRIKE OF 1984 -85.
